A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saddens me to say it\, but The Last Jedi ruined the Star Wars Universe for me. The weird pacing\, the fact that the plot circled around a ship not being able to jump closer to a target\, the destruction of the buildup for Finn\, Kylo Ren\, and Rey\, and the destruction of 30 years of Luke... really hurt the movie. I don't understand how the Tomatometer gives it a 91%\, while the Audience score is 51%. The disparity between the two really makes me wonder how legit these ratings are.
